channel.title: Eric Kripke on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Eric Kripke on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: How the Second Season of ‘Gen V’ Will Set Up the Fifth and Final Season of ‘The Boys’
item.description: Creator Eric Kripke also reveals he “just showed people the series finale” of ‘The Boys’ and gives an update on new prequel series ‘Vought Rising.’

item.title: How the Second Season of ‘Gen V’ Will Set Up the Fifth and Final Season of ‘The Boys’
item.description: Creator Eric Kripke also reveals he “just showed people the series finale” of ‘The Boys’ and gives an update on new prequel series ‘Vought Rising.’

item.title: Antony Starr Bids Farewell to ‘The Boys’: “It’s Truly Been the Highlight of My Career”
item.description: After portraying the infamous superhero villain throughout the show’s entirety, Starr will step away from the character when the Prime Video series wraps its upcoming fifth season.

item.title: Antony Starr Bids Farewell to ‘The Boys’: “It’s Truly Been the Highlight of My Career”
item.description: After portraying the infamous superhero villain throughout the show’s entirety, Starr will step away from the character when the Prime Video series wraps its upcoming fifth season.
